ðŸ“– Summary: Validoopsie is a Python data validation library designed for ease of use and flexibility. It allows users to define validation rules and chain them together in a manner similar to DataFrame libraries. The library incorporates the 'Bring Your Own DataFrame' concept, supporting various DataFrame types for data validation tasks.
